name: Gavin
body:
Hmm, seems comments aren't threading correctly...

The reason the reference to the tSQLt objects is in a separate project is that we probably don't want them deployed in _every_ environment.

Having the projects separated like this gives us the flexiblity to deploy our database _with_ the test framework in those environments where we need to run tests and _without_ the test framework in those environments where it's too late for testing such as "production"!
